name: Air Jordan 3 Valor Blue
description: The Air Jordan 3 Valor Blue is a classic sneaker that combines style and performance. It features a blue color scheme and premium materials for a luxurious look.

name: Jordan Mars London 270
description: The Jordan Mars London 270 is a versatile sports shoe that provides comfort and style. It features a unique design inspired by the city of London.

name: Air Jordan1 Zoom Racer Blue
description: The Air Jordan1 Zoom Racer Blue is a modern take on the classic Air Jordan 1. It features Zoom Air cushioning for enhanced comfort and a racer blue colorway for a stylish look.

name: Nike Cosmic Unity
description: The Nike Cosmic Unity is a high-performance sports shoe designed for basketball. It offers excellent traction, support, and cushioning for optimal performance on the court.

name: Nike React Infinity Run Flyknit
description: The Nike React Infinity Run Flyknit is a lightweight and responsive running shoe. It features a Flyknit upper for a snug fit and React foam cushioning for a comfortable stride.

name: Nike React Miler
description: The Nike React Miler is a durable and supportive running shoe. It features React foam cushioning for a smooth and responsive ride, making it ideal for long-distance runs.

name: Nike Air Force 1 '07
description: The radiance lives on in the Nike Air Force 1 '07, the b-ball OG that puts a fresh spin on what you know best: durably stitched overlays, clean finishes and the perfect amount of flash to make you shine.

name: Nike Air Max 2090
description: The Nike Air Max 2090 celebrates the future of Air with a design that blends heritage and innovation. The shoe's upper is made with at least 20% recycled content by weight. It features a Max Air unit in the heel for lightweight cushioning.

name: Nike Air Max 90
description: The Nike Air Max 90 is a classic running shoe that's been around since 1990. It features a leather and textile upper, a padded collar, a visible Air-Sole unit in the heel, and a rubber outsole.

name: Nike Air Max 95
description: The Nike Air Max 95 is a running shoe that was released in 1995. It features a leather and textile upper, a padded collar, a visible Air-Sole unit in the heel, and a rubber outsole.

name: Nike Air Max 97
description: The Nike Air Max 97 is a running shoe that was released in 1997. It features a leather and textile upper, a padded collar, a visible Air-Sole unit in the heel, and a rubber outsole.

name: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 38
description: The Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 38 is a versatile running shoe designed for comfort and performance. It features responsive cushioning and a breathable upper.

name: Adidas Ultraboost
description: The Adidas Ultraboost is a popular running shoe known for its comfort and energy-returning properties. It features a Primeknit upper and a Boost midsole.

name: New Balance 574
description: The New Balance 574 is a classic sneaker with a retro-inspired design. It features a suede and mesh upper and a cushioned ENCAP midsole.

name: Clyde Court Roses Basketball
description: The Puma Clyde Court Roses is a basketball shoe designed for performance on the court. It features a lightweight upper and responsive cushioning.

name: Reebok Classic Leather
description: The Reebok Classic Leather is an iconic sneaker known for its timeless design. It features a leather upper and a comfortable EVA midsole.

name: Nike Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG
description: The Nike Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG is a classic sneaker that pays homage to the original Air Jordan 1. It features a leather upper, iconic Air Jordan branding, and a high-top design.

name: Adidas Ultraboost 21
description: The Adidas Ultraboost 21 is a high-performance running shoe designed for maximum comfort and energy return. It features a Primeknit upper, responsive Boost cushioning, and a durable rubber outsole.

name: Puma RS 3.0 Future Vintage
description: The Puma RS 3.0 Future Vintage is a modern sneaker inspired by retro gaming. It features a chunky silhouette, vibrant color blocking, and a comfortable cushioned midsole.

name: New Balance Fresh Foam X-70
description: The New Balance Fresh Foam X-70 is a versatile lifestyle shoe that offers a blend of comfort and style. It features a lightweight Fresh Foam midsole, a breathable mesh upper, and a retro-inspired design.
